description: io: minor change in io.WriteAt docs.

messages.text:
Hello adg@golang.org, bradfitz@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

LGTM

I can submit later if others don't first.

On Wed, Mar 7, 2012 at 5:21 PM, <franciscossouza@gmail.com> wrote:

> Hello adg@golang.org, bradfitz@golang.org (cc:
> golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
>
> Please take another look.
>
>
> http://codereview.appspot.com/**5787048/<http://codereview.appspot.com/5787048/>
>

Hello adg@golang.org, bradfitz@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

End sentences with periods.

On Wed, Mar 7, 2012 at 5:13 PM, <franciscossouza@gmail.com> wrote:

> Reviewers: adg, bradfitz,
>
> Message:
> Hello adg@golang.org, bradfitz@golang.org (cc:
> golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://code.google.com/p/go
>
>
> Description:
> io: minor change in io.WriteAt docs
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/**5787048/<http://codereview.appspot.com/5787048/>
>
> Affected files:
>  M src/pkg/io/io.go
>
>
> Index: src/pkg/io/io.go
> ==============================**==============================**=======
> --- a/src/pkg/io/io.go
> +++ b/src/pkg/io/io.go
> @@ -179,7 +179,7 @@
>  // seek offset.
>  //
>  // Clients of WriteAt can execute parallel WriteAt calls on the same
> -// destination if the ranges are not overlapping.
> +// destination if the ranges do not overlap
>  type WriterAt interface {
>        WriteAt(p []byte, off int64) (n int, err error)
>  }
>
>
>

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=ef5efe93d5c6 ***
